Now these are the names<S>8034</S> of the tribes<S>7626</S>. From the north<S>6828</S> end<S>7097</S> to the coast<S>3027</S> of the way<S>1870</S> of Hethlon<S>2855</S>, as one goeth<S>935</S> to Hamath<S>2574</S>, Hazarenan<S>2704</S>, the border<S>1366</S> of Damascus<S>1834</S> northward<S>6828</S>, to the coast<S>3027</S> of Hamath<S>2574</S>; for these are his sides<S>6285</S> east<S>6921</S> and west<S>3220</S>; a<S>259</S> portion for Dan<S>1835</S>. <sup>a portion: Heb. one portion</sup>
And by the border<S>1366</S> of Dan<S>1835</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>, a<S>259</S> portion for Asher<S>836</S>.
And by the border<S>1366</S> of Asher<S>836</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> even unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>, a<S>259</S> portion for Naphtali<S>5321</S>.
And by the border<S>1366</S> of Naphtali<S>5321</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>, a<S>259</S> portion for Manasseh<S>4519</S>.
And by the border<S>1366</S> of Manasseh<S>4519</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>, a<S>259</S> portion for Ephraim<S>669</S>.
And by the border<S>1366</S> of Ephraim<S>669</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> even unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>, a<S>259</S> portion for Reuben<S>7205</S>.
And by the border<S>1366</S> of Reuben<S>7205</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>, a<S>259</S> portion for Judah<S>3063</S>.
And by the border<S>1366</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>, shall be the offering<S>8641</S> which ye shall offer<S>7311</S> of five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S> reeds in breadth<S>7341</S>, and in length<S>753</S> as one<S>259</S> of the other parts<S>2506</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>: and the sanctuary<S>4720</S> shall be in the midst<S>8432</S> of it.
The oblation<S>8641</S> that ye shall offer<S>7311</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> shall be of five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S> in length<S>753</S>, and of ten<S>6235</S> thousand<S>505</S> in breadth<S>7341</S>.
And for them, even for the priests<S>3548</S>, shall be this holy<S>6944</S> oblation<S>8641</S>; toward the north<S>6828</S> five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S> in length, and toward the west<S>3220</S> ten<S>6235</S> thousand<S>505</S> in breadth<S>7341</S>, and toward the east<S>6921</S> ten<S>6235</S> thousand<S>505</S> in breadth<S>7341</S>, and toward the south<S>5045</S> five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S> in length<S>753</S>: and the sanctuary<S>4720</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> shall be in the midst<S>8432</S> thereof.
It shall be for the priests<S>3548</S> that are sanctified<S>6942</S> of the sons<S>1121</S> of Zadok<S>6659</S>; which have kept<S>8104</S> my charge<S>4931</S>, which went not astray<S>8582</S> when the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> went astray<S>8582</S>, as the Levites<S>3881</S> went astray<S>8582</S>. <sup>It: or, The sanctified portion shall be for the priests</sup> <sup>charge: or, ward, or, ordinance</sup>
And this oblation<S>8642</S> of the land<S>776</S> that is offered<S>8641</S> shall be unto them a thing most<S>6944</S> holy<S>6944</S> by the border<S>1366</S> of the Levites<S>3881</S>.
And over against<S>5980</S> the border<S>1366</S> of the priests<S>3548</S> the Levites<S>3881</S> shall have five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S> in length<S>753</S>, and ten<S>6235</S> thousand<S>505</S> in breadth<S>7341</S>: all the length<S>753</S> shall be five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S>, and the breadth<S>7341</S> ten<S>6235</S> thousand<S>505</S>.
And they shall not sell<S>4376</S> of it, neither exchange<S>4171</S>, nor alienate<S>5674</S> <S>5674</S> the firstfruits<S>7225</S> of the land<S>776</S>: for it is holy<S>6944</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And the five<S>2568</S> thousand<S>505</S>, that are left<S>3498</S> in the breadth<S>7341</S> over against<S>6440</S> the five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S>, shall be a profane<S>2455</S> place for the city<S>5892</S>, for dwelling<S>4186</S>, and for suburbs<S>4054</S>: and the city<S>5892</S> shall be in the midst<S>8432</S> thereof.
And these shall be the measures<S>4060</S> thereof; the north<S>6828</S> side<S>6285</S> four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S> and five<S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S>, and the south<S>5045</S> side<S>6285</S> four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S> and five<S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S>, and on the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S> and five<S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S>, and the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S> four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S> and five<S>2568</S> <S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S>.
And the suburbs<S>4054</S> of the city<S>5892</S> shall be toward the north<S>6828</S> two hundred<S>3967</S> and fifty<S>2572</S>, and toward the south<S>5045</S> two hundred<S>3967</S> and fifty<S>2572</S>, and toward the east<S>6921</S> two hundred<S>3967</S> and fifty<S>2572</S>, and toward the west<S>3220</S> two hundred<S>3967</S> and fifty<S>2572</S>.
And the residue<S>3498</S> in length<S>753</S> over against<S>5980</S> the oblation<S>8641</S> of the holy<S>6944</S> portion shall be ten<S>6235</S> thousand<S>505</S> eastward<S>6921</S>, and ten<S>6235</S> thousand<S>505</S> westward<S>3220</S>: and it shall be over against<S>5980</S> the oblation<S>8641</S> of the holy<S>6944</S> portion; and the increase<S>8393</S> thereof shall be for food<S>3899</S> unto them that serve<S>5647</S> the city<S>5892</S>.
And they that serve<S>5647</S> the city<S>5892</S> shall serve<S>5647</S> it out of all the tribes<S>7626</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>.
All the oblation<S>8641</S> shall be five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S> by five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S>: ye shall offer<S>7311</S> the holy<S>6944</S> oblation<S>8641</S> foursquare<S>7243</S>, with the possession<S>272</S> of the city<S>5892</S>.
And the residue<S>3498</S> shall be for the prince<S>5387</S>, on the one side and on the other of the holy<S>6944</S> oblation<S>8641</S>, and of the possession<S>272</S> of the city<S>5892</S>, over against<S>6440</S> the five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S> of the oblation<S>8641</S> toward the east<S>6921</S> border<S>1366</S>, and westward<S>3220</S> over against<S>6440</S> the five<S>2568</S> and twenty<S>6242</S> thousand<S>505</S> toward the west<S>3220</S> border<S>1366</S>, over against<S>5980</S> the portions<S>2506</S> for the prince<S>5387</S>: and it shall be the holy<S>6944</S> oblation<S>8641</S>; and the sanctuary<S>4720</S> of the house<S>1004</S> shall be in the midst<S>8432</S> thereof.
Moreover from the possession<S>272</S> of the Levites<S>3881</S>, and from the possession<S>272</S> of the city<S>5892</S>, being in the midst<S>8432</S> of that which is the prince's<S>5387</S>, between the border<S>1366</S> of Judah<S>3063</S> and the border<S>1366</S> of Benjamin<S>1144</S>, shall be for the prince<S>5387</S>.
As for the rest<S>3499</S> of the tribes<S>7626</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>, Benjamin<S>1144</S> shall have a<S>259</S> portion. <sup>A portion: Heb. one portion</sup>
And by the border<S>1366</S> of Benjamin<S>1144</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>, Simeon<S>8095</S> shall have a<S>259</S> portion.
And by the border<S>1366</S> of Simeon<S>8095</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>, Issachar<S>3485</S> a<S>259</S> portion.
And by the border<S>1366</S> of Issachar<S>3485</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>, Zebulun<S>2074</S> a<S>259</S> portion.
And by the border<S>1366</S> of Zebulun<S>2074</S>, from the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> unto the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S>, Gad<S>1410</S> a<S>259</S> portion.
And by the border<S>1366</S> of Gad<S>1410</S>, at the south<S>5045</S> side<S>6285</S> southward<S>8486</S>, the border<S>1366</S> shall be even from Tamar<S>8559</S> unto the waters<S>4325</S> of strife<S>4808</S> <S>4809</S> in Kadesh<S>6946</S>, and to the river<S>5158</S> toward the great<S>1419</S> sea<S>3220</S>. <sup>strife: or, Meribahkadesh</sup>
This is the land<S>776</S> which ye shall divide<S>5307</S> by lot unto the tribes<S>7626</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> for inheritance<S>5159</S>, and these are their portions<S>4256</S>, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>.
And these are the goings out<S>8444</S> of the city<S>5892</S> on the north<S>6828</S> side<S>6285</S>, four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S> and five<S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S> measures<S>4060</S>.
And the gates<S>8179</S> of the city<S>5892</S> shall be after the names<S>8034</S> of the tribes<S>7626</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: three<S>7969</S> gates<S>8179</S> northward<S>6828</S>; one<S>259</S> gate<S>8179</S> of Reuben<S>7205</S>, one<S>259</S> gate<S>8179</S> of Judah<S>3063</S>, one<S>259</S> gate<S>8179</S> of Levi<S>3878</S>.
And at the east<S>6921</S> side<S>6285</S> four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S> and five<S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S>: and three<S>7969</S> gates<S>8179</S>; and one<S>259</S> gate<S>8179</S> of Joseph<S>3130</S>, one<S>259</S> gate<S>8179</S> of Benjamin<S>1144</S>, one<S>259</S> gate<S>8179</S> of Dan<S>1835</S>.
And at the south<S>5045</S> side<S>6285</S> four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S> and five<S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S> measures<S>4060</S>: and three<S>7969</S> gates<S>8179</S>; one<S>259</S> gate<S>8179</S> of Simeon<S>8095</S>, one<S>259</S> gate<S>8179</S> of Issachar<S>3485</S>, one<S>259</S> gate<S>8179</S> of Zebulun<S>2074</S>.
At the west<S>3220</S> side<S>6285</S> four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S> and five<S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S>, with their three<S>7969</S> gates<S>8179</S>; one<S>259</S> gate<S>8179</S> of Gad<S>1410</S>, one<S>259</S> gate<S>8179</S> of Asher<S>836</S>, one<S>259</S> gate<S>8179</S> of Naphtali<S>5321</S>.
It was round about<S>5439</S> eighteen<S>8083</S> <S>6240</S> thousand<S>505</S> measures: and the name<S>8034</S> of the city<S>5892</S> from that day<S>3117</S> shall be, The LORD is there<S>3074</S>. <sup>The LORD: Heb. Jehovahshammah</sup>
